reviews.comments: Responsible, friendly and nice host

The place is really amazing and My Linh is a great host. After originally having some problems with a former apartment of hers, she immediately send somebody to check and booked me into this new  apartment. I was very happy about the communication and her actions to make me feel calm and welcome. The apartment is really nice and has a great view. It is also very stylish and has a lot of space. I can't complain about the apartment or My Linh.
This is a great apartment, was a perfect and relaxing stay. The host is super respectful, helpful and responsive,  I highly recommend this stay!

Very central location - the room is actually in a residential building which is the same block as a shopping centre so everything is literally on your doorstep.
Lovely side view of the pool (didn‚Äôt use this) and onto the sea, lovely.

Cong was responsive, check-in was easy, place was clean, no weird smells. Location was good with the beach only a few blocks away and plenty of food / supermarkets around..
Few cons:
- No hand soap, only a really smelly shampoo
- The pool on the roof is useless, but there's a beach near by anyway
- No iron or steamer
Overall, these cons were quite minor and didn't affect my stay.

Under marketed, over delivered. added the buffet photos after arrival but the buffet is not needed. great food all over the place. location  and accommodation for cost was great. The owner Cong is hands down fantastic!
The place was very unsatisfactory in our opinion.
Toilet positioned such that you have to sit sideways to use it.
Shower drain, slow, front desk notified, 3 days later drain clogged, water pooling over entire bathroom floor. Resolved after it got that bad.
Karaoke bar that runs til 2300 every night.
Window shades in disrepair and almost non-functional, told front desk, informed all were slated for repair. No change while there.
No bathroom products except toilet paper, and a pump bottle of soap with a broken pump, had to pour it in to our hands when showering.
Housekeeping, cleaned the room but never changed the sheets entire stay, 11 nights. [We made note of a stain to ensure this is accurate.]
No hot water for 2 nights with no notice.
Motor bike rental, the bike shwed up almost bone dry for fuel. Gas gauge flashing warning about low fuel.
None of this was anything Cong could have done anything about so we never bothered him.
Fast replies, easy check in and I came in around 3 am. No problems at all and the room was just as pictured!

Large apartment with a sea view,  great to have 2 bathrooms even just for the two of us. So many restaurants, spas, grocery stores & minimarts all on the main floor & the beach across the street! And quiet. Cleaning every 3 days was a plus. Loved the location, would stay here again!

We stayed at this place for ten days and enjoyed it greatly. The appartment itself was worth every penny spent. A lot of space, 2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms, a wonderfully-equipped kitchen (if you need something extra, you'll be given it nearly immediately) and a balcony with a beautiful view of the sea to the left and the whole city to the right. The location was also perfect. You should have just crossed the road to get to the beach with soft warm sand. There were a lot of places around to eat or buy anything you wanted. And if you decided to get to the center, a taxi (or a scooter) was right at the enterance at any time.
The host is very hospitable and easy to get.
Highly recommended!

Location is great, right next to supermarket, walkable near the apartment. Need to update for comfortable of apartmets, kitchen and kitchen tools. Host is very resbons fast.

The host was very friendly and fast with responding, we booked last minute and late at night and he was still able to help and respond within the minute. The place was modern and very clean, looks exactly like what the photos shows. Would definitely come back if I visit Nha Trang again. I also have already recommended this place to family and friends. Thank you for a lovely stay.

The Apartment was great and the communication with the staff of Steve was very easy. They helped us a lot and never lost their good mood. We were there with 4 people and the Apartment was still big enough. It was very clean, very near to the beach and around the Apartment were a lot of good foods. We highly recommend the Apartment.

We would like to express our great gratitude to the owner of the apartment! She's amazing! Clean, new, spacious, with a fantastic view of the city, especially at night! The owner answered the questions in 1 minute. He was very responsive and hospitable! We liked it very much!!! Very quiet area. 5 minutes from the noisy center! The complex has a swimming pool with cool water. We lived in many places in Nha Trang! This is the coolest place! We recommend !!! And we will definitely come back only here !!!

Great view and great apartment. All is exactly as in description. Fully-equipped kitchen if you wanna cook, lots of space, washing machine with detergent, big and clean bathroom. Check in was easy, the host - extremely responsive and friendly. Totally recommend!

De appartement was zoals omschreven en erg comfortabel. De host is heel erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Ik had niet veel vragen want oorspronkelijk kom ik uit Nha Trang en woont mijn familie dichtbij waar ik verblijf. Ik neem zeker weer contact op met de host voor mijn volgende verblijf in Nha Trang.

As stated in the listing it isn‚Äôt in a central location. However, this wasn‚Äôt an issue as it is seconds away from the beach and a supermarket. It was very easy to make our own way into town by walk (40mins-1hr) or by taxi (10-15min).
I would recommend this listing for anyone staying in Nha Trang! Exceeded all expectations.

the place was amazing and it is located in an amazing area. the view of the beach is a plus and vinh was an amazing host!! i would definitely come here again if i have the chance!

We stayed here for 4 nights and had a great time. Very convenient location and close to the beach. Vinh the host was amazing, very responsive to questions and went out of his way to help with our needs. Definitely recommend this place and would stay again!

Nice, clean and comfortable place for us to stay. The location is just good and we walked around for 5 to 7 minutes and were able to reach the beach. The view from the balcony is just amazing.
Also to mention - the wifi speed was really good for me and my friend to work.
The kitchen was well equipped for us to cook something for the kids.
The location is just right if someone wants to go to the beach or look around for food places and a couple of Pagodas are also near by.
The host - Vinh - is nice and responsive. Thanks.
Scope for improvement - would be nice to have detergent for washing machine. And some pre written instructions about garbage disposal.
Otherwise this place is good and the Host makes you feel welcome and very helpful.
Overall a good stay.
Thanks.

I kinda feel reluctant to leave this review just in case more others rush to this hidden gem in Nha Trang and then booking is getting hard for me.  But it‚Äôs a MUST stay if you look for somewhere like a wild judge vibe but also enjoy a comfy stay. This is a two floors apartment and I stayed at ground floor this time. Room is spacious and everything in an Ancient Greek style deco. There‚Äôs a kitchen and mini pool in the yard for share with other guests on first floor. U can enjoy an outdoor shower and dipping in the pool by those tropical plants which was exactly what I‚Äôve been doing and taking lots good vibed photos. This place is quiet too but not far from main road and beach. A mini mart is around the corner too. And the host is super nice when I found body wash in short, the host came to my rescue in person within 10 mins. Overall it‚Äôs defiantly a paradise and also an important reason I would like to revisit Nha Trang.
Great experience. I'll be back to this place

Absolutely amazing stay in Nha Trang!

We stayed for a week at Anna's apartment and could not have been happier. For us the location, away from the mass tourism spots down by the Lotus building, was a big attraction, The area around the building - the restaurants, bars and locals, seemed far more genuine in this location and we loved the vibe.
The apartment does not disappoint in any way, the view from the balcony constantly changes depending on time of day, daylight and lighting - we never tired of sitting on the balcony, early morning, late afternoon or nightcap time - wonderful. The apartment was spotlessly clean, very well maintained, equipped to a high standard, had a fantastic fridge/freezer and very effective a/c. The bathroom again was very well maintained and has the best walk-in waterfall shower head I have experienced. The bed is huge and extremely comfortable.
We did not hear any sound from neighbouring apartments, it was nice to have a 24hr concierge presence in the lobby.
We will return to Anna's again.

Hi everyone,
I just checked out from my accommodation, and I‚Äôd like to share some thoughts. First of all, I booked the room very late at night, around dawn, but Cong still responded and confirmed my reservation, which I greatly appreciated. Additionally, I was able to check in as early as 4:40 AM thanks to the 24-hour reception.
Later, I realized that unfortunately, the pool on the 15th floor wasn‚Äôt operational. I mentioned that it was quite important to me, and they very kindly upgraded me to an even better room with an ocean view. Cong and the reception staff were extremely helpful, kind, and spoke English, which isn‚Äôt always common in Vietnam.
Since I needed a late checkout, they allowed me to stay longer without any extra charges, which was another notable and kind gesture.
Overall, it‚Äôs a 10/10 experience for me ‚Äì the location, cleanliness, and staff were all excellent. I genuinely recommend this place to everyone. If I return to Nha Trang, I‚Äôll definitely stay here again and

Visiting Nha Trang second time and I could not be happier with choice of Marilyn Hotel!
Rented studio for 1 month. Northern part of the city is quiet and relaxing. Hotel is just next to the coast and beach but hidden from main street and therefore - silence during the day and night!
Wi-Fi speed is more than enough for everyday usage: stable 50Mb/s upload and download (according to Speed App, but my Steam download peaked at 460 Mb/s and 110GB of content downloaded in 30 minutes!)
And most important - sense of peaceful and kindness from amazing staff. Wonderfull and warm Vi·ªát Nam and T√¢m are ready to support any moment or help you start the day with delicious breakfast and smile. (Nhi the dog <3)
Motorbike parking at the spot, laundry smelling like spring, local surfing spot just 5 minutes from the hotel, and gateway from the city into mountains trails or ferry to islands.
Perfect location and highest comfort. Feels more like homely stay than generic hotel service. Thank you! <3

Staying at this accommodation was a true delight. It was furnished with all of the necessary amenities that one might need, decorated in a clean and stylish fashion and boasted a bed that was especially comfortable. Not to mention access to a washing machine on the balcony that overlooks the ocean! The location itself is convenient to many groceries, restaurants, pharmacies, etc and is only 5-10 minutes away by motorbike to the main centre of the city. Because of this, there still maintains a sense of peacefulness to the general locality. The hosts were gracious, extremely communicative and were helpful in any way that they could be. They do offer an airport taxi service to and from the apartment for you to avail should you wish. This apartment would be a lovely stay for any guest in Nha Trang for their holiday retreat!

We loved our stay at Tram Anh‚Äôs place. The flat is very comfortable, close to the beach, with all amenities and supermarkets etc close by. Everything we needed for our stay in Nha Trang. Would definitely stay here again.

Very much enjoyed my month long stay at Tram Anh‚Äôs place in Nha Trang. Communications were friendly and always helpful. I had an issue with the electronic keypad for the door during my stay(dead battery), and it was fixed promptly.
The location is in a high-rise condo building north of the city center with many Russians. It can get a bit crazy with the amount of tourists there, so be prepared. As I had a motorbike, it was easy to get around. If you are without transportation, Grab will be your best friend. Decent beach right at your doorstep as well.
The unit was simple and comfortable. A great cooking environment that complimented the living space. Balcony with a view of the water. Quality washing machine. Comfy bed in the bedroom. The window to the hallway leaked light until 4am, so be aware of that.
The major downside was the bathroom. Small, no ventilation, and always a slight smell from the floor drain. Hot water was hit or miss.
All in all, I really enjoyed my time here.
Die Wohnung ist super sch√∂n eingerichtet und sehr gem√ºtlich. Eine echte Erfahrung einmal im 27. Stock zu wohnen. Klare Empfehlung!

I liked everything they prepared in the apartment because it was very welcoming, felt like home and complete with everything. Tram Anh provides all information very quickly and she tries to help you as quickly as possible.  I will come back on my next trip

We are extremely pleased with this place! Such a beautiful apartment and an amazing view from the window. Mattress and linens, oh my god, that mattress! He is so soft that I was very sorry to leave. The apartments are very clean and comfortable, there is everything for both short and long stays. There were even balloons in the bedroom! Communication with the owner was warm and comfortable. I recommend this accommodation

Location: Only recommended if you have a scooter. It is 1hr 15 mins walk from city centre. 15-20 mins public bus, but buses come every 30 mins and stop running after 7pm. Grab bike to city centre about 35,000 vnd/way. Tours charge extra for this location.
Facilities: You can dry clothes on the rooftop. Hot water in my room 201 was by luck. Before 8pm, I could get hot water. But afterwards, only cold water.
Room cleanness: One room cleaning/week for free. In my experience, I only asked for once and never ever again. Why? Hygiene problems! The cleaner used the brush to clean the toilet bowl first, then the plate. And no proper cleaning for the mop.
Comfort: Their billboard flashes and disturbs sleep at night even with the curtain closed.
Noise: There was always "noise" from local couples during weekends. And the dogs keep barking from early morning til midday.
The manager Ashley was very nice and helpful and the only person who can speak English here. The owners are bad though

I definitely would recommend this place for longer stays guests in Nha Trang.  Check in was easy and walkable to the beach and Cho Dam market.  The apartment was spacious and comfortable for 4 persons.  There is a pool on the rooftop which is accessible before 7pm.  You can find some good food around the area too.  If you want to prepare your own restrictive meal due to your diet you can find a morning market and supermarket nearby.

This was awesome. It's QUIET, 20th floor. None of that street level mega noise.
It has hotel-grade mattresses - very very comfortable.
We were able to function here for 2 weeks as a family - cooking for our baby, doing laundry - the apartment is sufficiently equipped.
I thought the view was among most iconic you can get - you see Dam market, green hills and mountains, river and see at the same time. Beautiful.
Rooftop pool was mostly empty, so that was great. Kids playroom (if that's your case) was huge benefit.
Everything felt new and it was very clean. No humidity and no bad-smelling wardrobes like in other places.
We loved our stay at Binh‚Äôs. We felt so comfortable coming back here after a long day of exploring. Amenities were fantastic and location was central. Thank you for a great stay!

The apartment is in a great location with views of the city and a smaller view of the ocean on a nice outdoor (20thfloor) patio.  Binh and Kelly were great and when we needed a few extra kitchen items they had them delivered to us.  The rooftop pool is a big plus also.
Nice and spacious Airbnb. Great location very close to the beach. Rooftop pool and gym closes at 7pm which is unfortunately early. Decent buffet breakfast downstairs at the hotel side.

This beautiful house has very friendly and helpful owners, they will do everything to make you comfortable. From the first days I felt at home. Fast Internet, no problems with hot water, everything you need for cooking is available. Near the house there is a market, a supermarket, a cafe, 5 minutes walk to the embankment, 10 minutes to the mountain climb, it's a good place. I lived in this house for 2 months, I thank the hosts for their hospitality, if I am in Nha Trang, I will undoubtedly choose this house again for long-term rent ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
the room corresponds to the description, price and photo. the owners of the house are always in touch and ready to help. there is a grocery market and a supermarket near the location.

Perfect place when ypu want to be a bit more far away from the center :)
more local

I lived in Vicky's house for 1 month, and it was one of the most pleasant experiences in my entire trip to Asia. First of all, thanks to the hosts. Thi Bich Tram and Nam are very responsive hosts, they were always in touch with me, helped when needed. Such hosts are worth their weight in gold! I felt at home.
I lived in several rooms in the house. The room with a window in the wall is a bit dark, it did not suit me because I spend a lot of time at home because of work. But the room is neat, new and clean.
There is a small market right around the corner, also a store, cafe, embankment nearby, a great beach is a 15-minute walk away, and the climb to Angel Mountain is a 10-minute walk away. The area will suit you if you like peace and quiet, immersion in the life of locals (there are very few tourists), unity with nature. I already miss the house and Nha Trang very much, thank you for this experience!

Nhans place was a perfect getaway location. The apartment was spacious and clean.Internet was good, AC took a while to start up but was great once on.
The view was beautiful to see the sunrise in the morning.
Hot water for shower was great as was the shower pressure. There were enough amenities, like toothbrush, combs and hair dryer.
Location was central to almost everything and just across the road to the beach with private cabanas available to visitors.
Only downside was that the pool was closed due to renovations, which we were not told of sooner, because we do like to have access to the pool and it was also a selling point at this property.
Also, there was a sensor light by the fridge and it would turn on every time there was movement which actually very annoying.
You have to pay for extra towels during your stay but we did not stay long enough so it worked out well for us.
Would definitely come back and recommend to others. FIX that light please!

My girlfriend and I had a pleasant stay in Nhan‚Äôs Condo in Nha Trang. The room was exactly as described, clean and modern, and in an excellent location right across from the beach. Guests have access to all facilities within StarCity hotel including the private beach facilities and pool.

Booked and stay there for 2 nights. Fast response from host, and she even helped me to inform taxi service about my flight delay. Strategic location, near to happening area (about 5- 10 minutes walk) Quiet and relaxing place. And the mud bath is awesome in Nha Trang! you can have seaview while relaxing in the room.

WOW!! The room was incredible really large open with a view over the bay in Nha Trang. We have lived in Nha Trang and been many times and this condotel is incredible value for money. The price is affordable, which makes up for its distance to the beach. The neighborhood is a new residential area with plenty empty lots, peaceful but safe at night. This was such an amazing stay in Nha Trang. It was such a beautiful experience of Vietnam. The place looked just like the pictures and I appreciated how responsive the hosts were.
This place accommodated my large family and we will be staying here again next time.

The house is spacious, surrounded by beautiful greenery, and located in a peaceful, quiet area. It‚Äôs clean and well-maintained, with convenient parking for motorbikes. Highly recommend for a comfortable and tranquil stay.
We stayed with the kids for a few days and were comfortable, quiet, and relaxing. It was nice that it was close to downtown, and the house was clean and beautiful, exactly like the pictures.
helpful and responsive hosts.

I recently stayed at this villa, and let me just say - it was an incredible experience from start to finish.
The place is absolutely gorgeous, with a modern design and stylish decor that instantly makes you feel relaxed and right at home. Plus, the location couldn't be better - it's super close to the city center, which made getting around and exploring local spots so easy.
Each room is cozy and private, so everyone has their own space to unwind. And the amenities? Top-notch. From a fully equipped kitchen to fast Wi-Fi and plenty of entertainment options, everything was there to make the stay comfortable and hassle-free.
But honestly, the highlight of the whole experience was the host. They were amazing - super friendly, helpful, and always a message away if we needed anything. They even gave us great recommendations for things to do. I will be back.
